dcterms:description: The PRAXIS dataset contains recordings of patients with cortical pathologies such as Alzheimerâ€™s disease, performing a Praxis test under the direction of a clinician. It includes skeletal data represented by body joint coordinates, RGB images, and depth images, which can be used for gesture classification and evaluating motor function abnormalities.
dcterms:title: PRAXIS Dataset
